definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: The third chapter is mainly about the establishment of urban landscapes, artistic language.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，主要是谈都市山水画艺术语言的建立。

sentences.english: Jiao's masterpieces mainly are Chinese landscape paintings, especially are ones about Songshan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 作品以中国山水画为主，尤以画嵩山见长。

sentences.english: The drawer is famous for his landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 这位画家以其山水画著称。

sentences.english: In 1992, he held in The China Academy of Art landscape paintings.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，他在中国美术学院举办山水画展。

sentences.english: The second phase was from the peak to late Tang period when landscape wash painting grew up.
sentences.chinese: 第二阶段是盛唐以后至唐末，水墨山水画崛起。

sentences.english: He paints landscapes with great facility.
sentences.chinese: 他画起山水画儿来得心应手。

sentences.english: The Tang and Five Dynasties was an important period in the development of Chinese ancient landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 唐五代是中国古代山水画发展过程中的一个重要时期。

sentences.english: Yixing county looks from afar like a traditional landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 宜兴县从远处看，就像一幅山水画。

sentences.english: Flower-and-bird painting, landscape painting, figure painting were in a tripartite balance in the Tang period.
sentences.chinese: 唐代的花鸟画与山水画同人物画鼎足而立。

sentences.english: Among those critics, Zong Bing and Emperor Yuan of Liang of the Southern Dynasty were well-known.
sentences.chinese: 其中宗炳和梁元帝为有名的山水画评论家。

sentences.english: On top of Meifeng there is a huge and valuable landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 梅峰上珍藏着一幅巨型的山水画。

sentences.english: Jiuzhaigou's scenery is worthy of Shu and landscape a new volume.
sentences.chinese: 九寨沟的风光不愧是蜀中又一幅新的山水画卷。

sentences.english: Chinese landscape painting in Qing Dynasty reached its peak during"six artists in early Qing Dynasty".
sentences.chinese: 清代山水画，发展至“清初六家”，可以说达到顶峰。

sentences.english: There aren ' t many theories about landscape sketching in ancient china.
sentences.chinese: 在中国历代画论中，论及山水画写生的不多。

sentences.english: See Wang Wenfang paintings, seems a far cry from the traditional Chinese landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 看王文芳的画，似乎和中国传统山水画相去甚远。

sentences.english: There is a huge landscape painting kept up there.
sentences.chinese: 梅峰上珍藏着一幅巨型的山水画。

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
Huang Binhong (1865-1955), art historian and literati painter
Shi Tao (1642-1707), Chinese landscape painter and poet
accurate depiction of architectural forms with the aid of a ruler (technique of Chinese art)/picture created using this technique
